commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, hey, everyone! Did you see the notice board?! There's a notice about a re-election between Shioriko Mifune and Setsu!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ai, you don't have to shout so loud! We saw it too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Looks like Mifune was serious.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: She just declared war on Setsuna and she's already posting notices about the re-election, huh?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: She sure gets the job done fast.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We won't sit back and let her win!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm sorry for causing all this trouble just when we were about to put all our efforts into the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not at all! You shouldn't be apologizing for anything. I bet you're the most unsettled by all of this.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: That's right. You don't need to worry about us, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup. I was surprised by the sudden turn of events, but let's all band together to think about how to win the election.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We're your allies. Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I did some research myself about the section Mifune pointed out, and it is just as she says.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: As such, if the election results force me to resign as student council president, then it would mean that I made an error and am left with no other choice.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: However, if she were to become the student council president, then the club...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh! That's right!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I believe that in one's high school career, a period when one must prepare for the future, school idol activities are meaningless. Her whole spiel took it too far!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm a little hopping mad!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It's just as you say, Kanata. She doesn't understand a thing about Setsuna or about school idols.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I doubt she's ever seen a school idol performance before. That's why she says things like that!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Argh, I'm getting all fired up inside!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Kasumi, calm down. Now, now, it's okay.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: There's no way I can be calm! I mean, come on! That Shioriko Mifune is making a mockery of Setsuna and school idols as a whole!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: M-Maybe you're seeing it worse than it really is. After all, it doesn't seem like she's revealed Setsuna's secret, and she might really have the school's best interests in...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Naw. Even if you give her the benefit of the doubt there, Shioriko still doesn't understand Setsuna for who she is.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Setsuna's worked hard to manage her duties as the student council president while also being a school idol.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, that's right, and that's exactly why all the other student council members follow along with the way Setsuna does things.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you so much, everyone. However, I can't deny that I have been putting most of my focus into my school idol activities these days.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Perhaps she figured I wasn't suited to be the student council president after seeing me do that.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hmm, that's a sore point to touch on. Things have been in a fluster lately because of the School Idol Festival cancellation.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Even so, you can't go and ignore everything else she's done up to now.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Despite seeing Setsuna as your rival, you sure respect her efforts, Karin. You might say you hate her, but maybe you actually love her!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Th-That's not true. I was just...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you very much, Karin!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You've got the wrong idea! Without a formidable rival like you, there's no real competit--

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, we get it, Karin loves Setsu. Let's put that aside and focus on the matter at hand, what to do next.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I said you've got it all wrong!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's just as Karin said. It's too cruel to suddenly take away all of the effort Setsuna's put in up until now!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I want Setsuna to give it her all as the student council president as well as a school idol, just like she has been.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, I agree!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: For the sake of the School Idol Club as well, we can't afford to lose here!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Girls!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone seems to be on the same page. We want Setsuna to continue along as the student council president and don't want any changes to the School Idol Club!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Which means...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: She has to win! Rina-chan Board says, "Hmph!"

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Giggle* I knew it would come to this! That's why I tapped into my grade's intelligence network to find out what kind of person this Mifune is!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She is...somebody who stands out in our grade. She's the second daughter of the Mifune's, a prestigious Japanese family living off their previous wealthy ventures.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey! I wanted to say that!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She's calm and academically gifted. Someone achieved good results in their club activities through her advice, so they say that she knows people's strengths and weaknesses.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: While there's no denying that she's an incredible person, trying to take the presidency from Setsuna as a first-year student is taking it too far.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's...what I wanted to say.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, I'm sorry, Kasumi! You can take it from here!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Sob* Apparently, she always wears a kimono at home.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Aww, you wanted to say what Shizuku said, right? It's okay, Kasukasu! You did a great job with all of your research! Good girl, Kasukasu!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Don't call me that!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi, Shizuku, thank you! We can't start forming a strategy without knowing about the enemy first. You've really helped us out!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Giggle* You can keep praising me, you know? You can pat me on the head, you know?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Here you go!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I wasn't talking about you! But thanks anyway, Shizuko.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hmm... The more I learn about her, the more I understand why she's so full of confidence.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But Setsuna has all of her past experiences to draw from. She won't lose to her!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you all so much. I understand now that Mifune is someone who has the skills to hold a position above others and guide them.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But that does not mean that I will give up. I will begin preparations to be re-elected and prevent the club from being disbanded.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We'll all help you out, Setsuna!
